discussion_comments.comment_body:
nit: can you replace

```tsx
	const { showIP } = params;
```
with
```tsx
const showIP = params.showIP ?? true;
```
?

this way, we would not need `showIP ?? true`

commented_code:
id: `${metricName}----${metricType}---string--`,
 						isColumn: true,
 						isJSON: false,
+						dataType: DataTypes.String,

discussion_comments.commented_code:
@@ -108,6 +108,7 @@ export function getMetricDetailsQuery(
 						id: `${metricName}----${metricType}---string--`,
 						isColumn: true,
 						isJSON: false,
+						dataType: DataTypes.String,
discussion_comments.comment_body: datatype will not be string always, or is it only the default and it will be later overrirden by actual values?

discussion_comments.commented_code:
@@ -108,6 +108,7 @@ export function getMetricDetailsQuery(
 						id: `${metricName}----${metricType}---string--`,
 						isColumn: true,
 						isJSON: false,
+						dataType: DataTypes.String,
discussion_comments.comment_body: Yes it's later overrided when the filter keys and values API calls are made inside query builder. The dataType value from the selected filter key in Keys API is used in the payload of the Values API Call.
